1.「追いつめたぜ 魔女グレイツェル！: I've got you cornered, Witch Grätzel!

2.「むこうの世界で| しっぽ巻いて 逃げやがってから| ずいぶん ご無沙汰だったじ: It's been a long time since you ran away with|your tail between your legs...

3.「フフ 追いつめたですって？: What do you mean, you hunted him down?

4.「おあいにくさま。| あなたは 誘い込まれただけ<heart> | キャハハハハ: I'm here to... You were just lured in.<heart>Hahahahaha!

6.「心臓のない 身体で | どれだけ戦えるか 試してあげる<heart>| たっぷ: A body without a heart| I'm gonna test you to see how well you fight<heart>You're going to feel so helpless!

8.「クソッ……腐りかけのトマトか。| こんがり焼きゃ 食えんだろ。: Shit... Rotten tuna... You can eat it when|it's brown...

10.<center>あなたの心臓は|壊れてしまって 永遠に失われるの。: Your heart is broken, lost forever...

11.「カラッポのくせに うずきやがる。| さすがに 心臓のねえ身体は きついぜ。: You're empty, but you're tingling... You're|right. A body without a heart is...

12.「……<cs_pchero>！| いい時に 来てくれんじゃねえか。: <cs_pchero>Oh! You've come at a good time.

13.「すまねえが 魔女のトマトどもを| けちらしてくれ！: I'm sorry, but I'm gonna need you to get rid|of those witch tomatoes!

14.「グエ グエ グエーーーーー！！: Gueh, gueh, gueh, gueh, gueh, gueh!

15.「<cs_pchero>！| 魔女のトマトどもを けちらしてくれ！: <cs_pchero>Oh, my God! Get those witch tomatoes out of|here!

16.「グエ グエ グエーーーーー！！: Gueh, gueh, gueh, gueh, gueh, gueh!

18.「魔女を追いつめたつもりが 罠にかけられてよ。 | 悪夢のトマトパーティーだった: I thought I had the witch cornered, but she|trapped me... It's a nightmare tomato|party...

19.「ありがとよ <cs_pchero>。| お前には いつも 助けられちまうな。: Thanks, man<cs_pchero>I'm sorry. You've always helped me...

20.「そうだ あの クチうるさい娘……| アイリは 元気にやってんのか？<yesno: Yeah, that nagging girl... How's Iris doing?<yesno><close>

22.「俺は こっちの世界に帰ってから| メルサンディ村を 拠点にして| 魔女を探して: I've been looking for a witch in the village|of Melsundy since I came back to this world.

25.「お前も 知っているように| 俺の心臓は 魔女によって壊された。: As you know, my heart was broken by a|witch...

26.「この身体には 心臓がねえ。| そこを 無理に動かしてるもんだから| ガタが来て: This body has a heart... I've been forcing it|to work so hard, it's starting to give out.

27.「だがな……俺のチカラの源は 村人たちの希望。| あいつらが 信じてくれる限り: But you see... My power comes from the|villagers... As long as they believe in me, I|can't... I don't have to worry...

28.「これ以上 あの魔女の 好きにはさせねえ。 | まだ 気配が残ってるうちに追うぜ: I won't let that witch get away with any|more... While there's still a hint of her...|I...

29.「天才童話作家 パンパニーニじゃ！！: It's Papanini, the genius fairy tale writer!

30.「メルサンディ村に残る 名作| 『小さな英雄ザンクローネの物語』を描いた| 張本: He's the one who drew "The Tale of Zancrone,|the Little Hero", the masterpiece that|remains in the village of Mersandi! Whoo-hoo!

31.「<pc>。おぬし この村が | 本当の メルサンディ村でないことは| とっくに: <pc> I'm sorry. You've long realized that this|village isn't really Mersandi Village,|haven't you?

32.「お察しの通り この村は 大魔王によって | わしの描いた童話の世界が 再現され: As you may have guessed, this village has|been recreated by the Great Demon King in my|fairy tale world of Mersandi...

33.「フン！ わしが描いてる途中で 死んだせいで | ザンクローネの敗北で終わってし: Hmph! I was in the middle of a painting when|I died, and it ended with Zancrone's|defeat... and you liked the tragic ending.

34.「そんな わしが この世界にいる理由じゃが | ……じつは 自分の分身を 作品の: And that's why I'm here in this world. To|tell you the truth, it's my way of secretly|introducing my alter ego into my work.

35.「そのせいで どうやら この村が作られた時に | わしの魂も呼びもどされ この通:
It seems that because of this, when this|village was built, my soul was also summoned|and transferred to my alter ego as you can|
|see...

36.「しかし……いまひとつ 解せん。| なぜ ザンクローネの死で 終わっていたはずの: But... But... Why is it that a story that|should have ended with Zancrone's death has|begun again?

37.「おぬし ひょっとして| 小さな英雄の物語の続きを 誰かが| 描いているのを 知: You know, maybe you know someone who's|working on a continuation of the story of our|little hero, don't you?

39.「わしの愛する 孫のアイリちゃんが！| わしの後を継ぎ 物語の続きを| 描きはじ: My beloved grandson, Aili... My beloved|grandson, Aili, has taken over from me and|begun to draw the rest of the story.

40.「……そうか！| それで ふたたび ザンクローネが現れ | 物語が動きはじめたん: ... Right! And now Zancrone is back, and the|story begins to unfold!

41.「うっうっ。あの 病弱だったアイリちゃんが| 創作の喜びを 見出してくれるとは…: I can't believe it. I never thought I'd see|the joy of creativity in that sickly little|girl, Aili. I'm thrilled...

42.「あい わかった！| 男 パンパニーニ 享年８７歳！| アイリちゃんの描く物語を: I got it! Pampanini, 87 years old! I'll be|watching over you as you tell the story of|Aili...

43.「……おお 忘れとった。 | 頼みを聞いてくれた 礼をしとらんかったな。| これ: ... Oh, I forgot... I guess I shouldn't thank|you for doing me a favor. Here, take this...

44.「アイリちゃんの描く 小さな英雄の物語| ……続きが 楽しみじゃのう！: A story of a little hero drawn by Aili... I|can't wait to read more!
